attributes.action: Cannabis law reform personal licenses regulate and taxation =Reform
attributes.additional_details: To reform the unjust, bigoted and repressive laws criminalising British people for making a free choice over which drug we choose to use other than the dangerous government sponsored drugs of death and destruction, namely alcohol and  tobacco. To set up a legal regulated and licensed form of importation and production to protect UK consumers from contaminates that currently adversely effect the health and well being of millions in our nation. To further allow for home cultivation of up to 30 cannabis plants for personal (not for profit) consumption bringing some form of uniformity with the right to brew alcohol or grow your own tobacco.
